Once a wealthy heiress, Bea now runs her aunt's bridal shop after her family lost everything due to a rivalry with Finn's family. Meanwhile, Finn, the local boy, is poised to take over his father's company. Together, they unite to prevent Finn's father from demolishing part of their small town to make way for hotels and condos.
